title: Placing Platforms
medium: Painted wood benches, photograph panels, and text panel
dimensions: Platform 12 x 41 3/8 x 41 3/8" (30.5 x 105 x 105 cm); panel with twenty photographs 45 1/8 x 51 3/4" (114.7 x 131.5 cm); panel with thirty-five photographs 52 5/8 x 47 7/8" (133.5 x 121.6 cm); text panel 18 5/8 x 15" (47.3 x 38 cm)
